| HistoryText             = The Triad were three creatures named [[Goblin (Triad) (Earth-616)|Goblin]], [[Guardian (Triad) (Earth-616)|Guardian]] and  [[Glow (Triad) (Earth-616)|Glow]] which appeared apparently out of nowhere to guide the then nearly mindless [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] through the worlds accessible from the Crossroads dimension. They were actually manifestations of Bruce Banner's troubled psyche, which lay dormant within the monster; Guardian embodied Banner's sense of self-preservation, Goblin his anger, and Glow his powers of reason. Having worked out their true natures, the Triad merged with the Hulk in order to reawaken his dormant Banner persona.{{r|Incredible Hulk #308|312}}
